commit_list.message: Initial commit
set up domain
teste4
rolling back

Added a column for the # high impact papers

Count the number of papers published on Nature, Science and Cell.
+Changed sep from " " to "\t"

First commit

Playing around with a script to fetch papers from a given author
or list of authors (using ";"), count the number of papers and
extract the keywords from his abstracts; a lot of space for
improvements.
Adding some dumps and tests
Fixing stupids commits...
Created README.md and updated output example

Parameterize search fiels

Neat! Now I can search for extra fields through the
command line:
 --additional-fields "AD:Miami"
 --additional-fields "AD:Miami;AU:Navarro" for example
Playing around with PubMed records
Minor changes on the webpage design
BUG: Fixed coordinate search of chrX and chrY

English corrections and minor design changes.
Species summary has been upgraded to also display information about expressed retrocopies.
Minor changes on publication, news and credits

Updated google chart API on species pages.
Enhance select speed for the species data.
New email image from pgalante email
English correction on FAQ/Help. Email on credits is now an image.
Updated Pedro suggestions on the front-end. Minor changes such as terms, sizes and order of lines.
Making the design compatible to the IE browser

Search engine is now faster and more intelligent :)
Fixed some problems on perfect mach on gene name.
Overloaded the paginatecount on the model for faster queries.

FAQ and Help pages were splited on two distinct pages. Minor changes on the design of the Publications, Credits, Contact, Help and FAQ pages.
We finally have a first version of the Help and FAQ text :)
Small change on GoogleChart API. All charts have a min value of 0, which remove the oddly look when all supports are 0.
BUG: Refseq sequence on related sequences
Minor changes on the feedback system
First Version of the Feedback system.

Few minor improvements
 - Specie name is now the scientific name
 - UCSC GB link opens on new tabs
 - Fixed off-line UCSC track for gene perspective
BUG: html->link must be a string.
UCSC GB link is now done off-line, this allow to enhance the current tracks and, also, show tracks on search links

Debug is no longer necessary
Search result no longer show method
Removed statistics and added FAQ/Help section on top bar
Changed some files locations because of the address renaming
NCBI embeded genome browser is not available for Gorilla. Added a conditional removing genomic context when showing gorilla retrocopies
Minor changes on displayed messages on search() function (retrogenes to retrocopies)

Included some comments on search function for better understanding
Debug on search view
Target gene shouldnt be a link to parental perspective (Remove Link, Added bold)

Changed webtool icon :)
Corrected home figure
Homo update, included figures used on last poster about retrocopies.

Changed address from retrogenes to retrocopies.
New controller Retrocopies using retrogenes data
Genes Table of Contents
Parental Gene multiple alignment is now done off-line (performance enhancement)

Design UPDATE:
 - Portlets now have a fixed size (better visualization)
 - Updated Retrocopies Table of Contents

Updated publications page.
Gorilla is now accessable to searches
Multiple alignment of retrocopies is now done off-line (for speed improvement).
Updated the title from Retrocopies and Parental Gene controllers

New graphical view of conservation/expression
Included conservation and expression model
Genomic context is now working. A new table/model was necessary to "translate" chromosome to accession id
Better implementation of Expression Figures

- New expressio Model/Controler
- Included Expression information on RCP description
- Changed Credits/Publications

Manual curation is now supported by retrogenes field "suppress".
Updated all selects of retrogenes filtering allowing only retrogenes.suppress = 0 to be shown.
Path to the specie RCPs image has changed
Ops! Corretion of last commit. Path for the image was wrong
Circos from all retrocopies from a specific gene now uses the database Gene.Id, this is better since now we are using at least 7 species
Changed the available species of the database.
Changed table column name for official name

Minor changes
Included target gene information

Minor corrections regarding the output of identity, overlap.
Removed the RefSeq CDS sequence
External Links are now funcional
ODC

Initial commint
 Does it works?
more rsizing
resizing figures
now with figures

commit_list.message:
Bug fixes
 - Librarian has two main rules, create_ref and create_plots
  - create_ref is fast and is only resposible for creating the structure for TeXP libraries
  - create_plots is slow and simulates reads over subfamilies to create three plots:
    1. Number of copies and number of bases
    2. Alignment quality heatmap
    3. Subfamily rossmapping heatmap
 - Small fixes in makefile and lsei template script
 - Also a few fixes in the heatmap crossmapping

commit_list.message:
Please, do not duplicate the INPUT
 - Usually it is stupid to duplicate the INPUT file for the sake of the next steps.
 - Stream the head of the INPUT file to generate:
   - MEAN_READ_LENGHT
   - QUALITY
   - Filter bad reads
